entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
